GigabitEthernet0/1 is up, line protocol is up
  Hardware is Gigabit Ethernet, address is 0026.9876.1234 (bia 0026.9876.1234)
  Description: Uplink to Core
  Internet address is 10.0.0.1/24
  MTU 1500 bytes, BW 1000000 Kbit, DLY 10 usec,
  Encapsulation ARPA, loopback not set
  Last input 00:00:01, output 00:00:02, output hang never
  Input queue: 0/75/0/0 (size/max/drops/flushes); Total output drops: 0
  Queueing strategy: fifo
  Full-duplex, 1000Mb/s, media type is 10/100/1000BaseTX
  5 minute input rate 50000 bits/sec, 40 packets/sec
  5 minute output rate 60000 bits/sec, 45 packets/sec
  123456 packets input, 78901234 bytes, 0 no buffer
  0 runts, 0 giants, 0 throttles
  0 input errors, 0 CRC, 0 frame, 0 overrun, 0 ignored, 0 abort
  234567 packets output, 89012345 bytes, 0 underruns
  0 output errors, 0 collisions, 0 interface resets
GigabitEthernet0/2 is administratively down, line protocol is down
  Hardware is Gigabit Ethernet, address is 0026.9876.5678 (bia 0026.9876.5678)
  Description: Unused port
  Internet address is 192.168.1.1/30
  MTU 1500 bytes, BW 1000000 Kbit, DLY 10 usec,
  Encapsulation ARPA, loopback not set
  Last input never, output never, output hang never
  Input queue: 0/75/0/0 (size/max/drops/flushes); Total output drops: 0
  Queueing strategy: fifo
  Auto-duplex, Auto-speed, media type is 10/100/1000BaseTX
  5 minute input rate 0 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
  5 minute output rate 0 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
  0 packets input, 0 bytes, 0 no buffer
  0 runts, 0 giants, 0 throttles
  0 input errors, 0 CRC, 0 frame, 0 overrun, 0 ignored, 0 abort
  0 packets output, 0 bytes, 0 underruns
